Correct. There isn't exactly hybrid specific tires, but there are low rolling resistance tires and there are tires marketed for EVs that are low rolling resistance as for you know better fuel economy as well as noise reduction.

The tires that Vincent has those are all weather tires those are going to have a deeper tread they're going to have they may be softer they're more catered towards inclement weather.
